property.value: House Lannister only. Response: kneel 2 influence to cancel a triggered effect that would kill a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that effect's controller cannot trigger any further effects or abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Challenges: kneel X influence to choose X Longship locations. Until the end of the phase, those locations become characters with 2 STR, stealth, and a military and power icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Dominance: choose and kneel a House card. Then, discard all attachments on that House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: kneel 1 influence to cancel the effects of a character or location ability. Then, kneel that character or location.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Any phase: kneel 3 influence to choose and kill a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose and kneel a character with STR 2 or lower. Response: after an Others plot card is revealed, kneel 1 influence to return Shadow in the North from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Any phase: kneel X influence to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Marshalling: kneel 2 influence to look at each opponent's hand. Then, choose and discard an attachment or non-unique character with printed cost 2 or lower from each of those hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking or defending Baratheon character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, claim 2 power for your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: copy the effects of an event card or character ability just triggered (without paying any costs).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking Lannister character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a Stark character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR and does not kneel to defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking or defending Greyjoy character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and cannot be killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Challenges: kneel X influence to choose X characters. Those characters must participate in the next challenge, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a challenge and count 8 or more total STR, claim 3 power for your House. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Response: after a Dothraki character is killed, kneel 3 influence to have each other Dothraki character claim 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking Martell character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge, shuffle any one player's discard pile into his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose a character or location. Until the end of the phase, treat the text box of that character or location as though its text box were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Dominance: kneel 1 influence to exchange any character in your dead pile with a character in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a challenge, choose an opponent. Lower the claim value on his or her revealed plot card by 1 for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: kneel 2 influence to discard from play (cannot be saved) all unique characters and locations controlled by more than one player.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Any phase: kneel 3 influence to discard all attachments from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Response: kneel 1 influence to cancel the effects of an event card just played.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Challenges: kneel 2 influence to choose a character with STR 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, take control of that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking Targaryen character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, choose and discard an attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: kneel 3 influence to discard the top 5 cards from each opponent's deck. Draw a card for each doomed card thus discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Challenges: choose an opponent. That opponent cannot trigger any effects during military and power challenges this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Challenges: kneel 2 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a military icon, an intrigue icon, and a power icon. Then, for each printed icon that character has, that character's controller must choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Any phase: kneel 2 influence to choose and discard a location from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose a character without a power icon. Discard all attachments and power from that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a character without an intrique icon. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose a character without a military icon. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -3 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Any phase: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for a Stark character with printed cost 2 or lower and put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: kneel 4 influence to discard all characters from play

property.name: Text
property.value: Each opponent adds 1 to his or her total income.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kindom. When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plots in your used pile, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Others. When revealed, if you have 2 or more Others plot cards in your used pile, choose and kill a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot claim power for unopposed challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingdom. When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for a character, reveal that character, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players with a lower total initiative than you cannot declare more than 1 defender during a challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during power challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Others. When revealed, choose and kneel X characters and/or locations. X is the number of Others plot cards in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all characters in play as though their text boxes were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. When revealed, you may choose a character you control. Return that character to its owner's hand.

card.name: Foe I was Born to Fight

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents with Others plot cards as their revealed plot card cannot declare defenders this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingdom. Characters you control get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingdom. When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for a location card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during intrigue challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Characters without an intrigue icon get -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. When revealed, choose a character in any discard pile. Move that character to its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, cancel the effects of each opponent's revealed plot card. Each opponent must then reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters cannot be killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during military challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot play non-character cards and cannot trigger card effects or abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each opponent may return his or her revealed plot card to his or her plot deck and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Others. Characters get -2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Characters you control cannot be bypassed with stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Each challenge you win by 4 or more total STR is considered unopposed.

card.name: Whose Name May Not Be Spoken

property.name: Text
property.value: Others. When revealed, name attachment or location. Each player must choose and discard one of his cards of the named type from play, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the cost for all players to play characters and attachments by 2. This is considered to be a gold penalty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Others. When revealed, if you have 2 or more Others cards in your used pile, kill all characters (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Add +2 to your total STR for each challenge in which you have at least 1 participating character.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty to play Maester characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. Night's Watch characters you control may be declared as attackers or defenders during military and power challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 additional power to win the game. When you announce Treaty as your Agenda, announce a House. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty to play characters, locations and attachments from the announced House.
